attributes.action: concur  with  the  High Courts  ruling  on  MP's  expenses  and have  the  expenses  published  in  full.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No other organisation in the  real world  would  be allowed  to  get  away with  such  apparent obfuscation.  The  tax  payers are entitled to  know exactly  how  their money is  spent  and  Harriet Harmans latest attempt to create  just a  few  more  overall  categories is  a deliberate show  of arrogance  to  the British  public  from  those  elcted and who  now seem  to  believe they are above  mere mortals.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
